!An occupational change means someone with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. A Warrior like yourself may change occupations to a *Warlord* or a *Gladiator*. Which occupation do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/30.htm|Gladiator] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/33.htm|Warlord]Â
